entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
